darkelf.name: darkelf
darkelf.label: Dark Elf
darkelf.desc: Often considered to be selfish and malicious, Dark elves are not well liked by the other elves. They have dark blue/black skin and stand on average between 4'5" and 5'9" tall.

skills.name: merciless
skills.label: Merciless
skills.desc: Passive - +1 on all attack rolls against wounded targets (increases to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, +4 at level 11 and +5 at level 20)

dwarf.name: dwarf
dwarf.label: Dwarf
dwarf.desc: Dwarves are known for their love of treasure, beer and facial hair. They are only slightly taller than halflings on average but are generally much stockier.

halfling.name: halfling
halfling.label: Halfling
halfling.desc: Though small in stature halflings tend to have big personalities and are generally friendly and optimistic. They stand on average between 3' and 4'5" tall.

skills.name: tiny
skills.label: Tiny
skills.desc: Passive - +1 to all dodge rolls (increases to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, +4 at level 15, +5 at level 20)

highelf.name: highelf
highelf.label: High Elf
highelf.desc: The proudest and most beautiful of all the elven races, high elves are a usually good-natured and caring, though do quite often see themselves as a superior race.

skills.name: meditate
skills.label: Meditate
skills.desc: Passive - When taking a short rest, the high elf may refresh one 'once per day' ability. They then become exhausted.

human.name: human
human.label: Human
human.desc: The most abundant race in the world of Solusek, humans are incredibly varied and flexible. They stand on average between 5' and 6'6" tall.

skills.name: flexible
skills.label: Flexible
skills.desc: Passive - humans receive 5 additional stat points to distribute at the start

iksar.name: iksar
iksar.label: Iksar
iksar.desc: Said to be descended from the mating between ancient dragons and humans, Iksar are easily recognisable by their scaled, lizard-like skin. Iksar tend to be of similar stature to humans.

skills.name: scaled
skills.label: Scaled
skills.desc: Passive - +1 to armour (increases to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, +4 at level 15 and +5 at level 20)

ogre.name: ogre
ogre.label: Ogre
ogre.desc: The largest (and heaviest) of the races, ogres typically posses great strength and not-so-great intellect. They stand between 8'0 and 9'5 tall.

skills.name: bigboned
skills.label: Big-boned
skills.desc: Passive - +5 to any saving throws vs stun or knockdown

troll.name: troll
troll.label: Troll
troll.desc: The green and slender cousin to the ogres, trolls are feared for their ability to regenerate quickly in combat. They stand between 7'5 and 9' tall.

skills.name: regeneration
skills.label: Regeneration
skills.desc: Passive - Regenerate 1 health at the end of each combat round (increases to 2 at level 3, 3 at level 6, 4 at level 9, 5 at level 12, 6 at level 15, and 7 at level 18)

woodelf.name: woodelf
woodelf.label: Wood Elf
woodelf.desc: The most neutral of the three elven races, wood elves like to keep to themselves and are most happy when at one with nature.
